topic.title: Abstract

body.p: This document describes the AMBA interconnect used in the device top level. This interconnect provides all configuration bus inter-connectivity within the TL_IC, as well as providing access to an external configuration bus AXI outside the TL_IC, The primary AMBA interconnect is provided by ARM, Inc., as reconfigurable IP, and is configured to meet specific requirements of the device. This document describes the specific configuration used in the device. Readers must be familiar with AMBA interconnect documentation from ARM, as well as AMBA specification (AXI, AHB, APB) to appreciate the content of this document.
